Alert

Class FrequentAlert

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppID.KeyedEntity
      • Alert.Alert
        • Alert.FrequentAlert
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class FrequentAlert
extends Alert
implements java.io.Serializable
    A subclass of Alert that represents an alert that can repeat with a frequency
    See Also:
